sentences.en: Husbands and wives of British nationals do not automatically gain citizenship.
sentences.cn: 英国公民的配偶不能自动取得公民身分.

sentences.en: Israel offers automatic citizenship to all Jews who want it, whatever colour they are and whichever language they speak.
sentences.cn: 犹太人只要愿意，均可自动加入以色列国籍，不管他们是什么肤色，不管他们说何种语言。

sentences.en: McGuirk holds dual citizenship (= the legal right of being a citizen in two countries ) in Ireland and the US.
sentences.cn: 麦吉尔克拥有爱尔兰和美国的双重国籍。

sentences.en: Not only was everything he had taken away from him, but also his German citizenship.
sentences.cn: 不仅他所有的一切都被没收了, 而且他的德国公民权也被剥夺了.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the relationship between personnel satisfaction and organizational citizenship behavior.
sentences.cn: 目的研究员工满意度等因素与组织公民行为之间的关系.

sentences.en: Only people who can trace their family history in Kuwait back before 1920 are entitled to citizenship.
sentences.cn: 只有其在科威特的家族史可以追溯到1920年以前的人才能获国籍。

sentences.en: She put a cupped palm to Byron's face,'something about Uncle Aron's citizenship. "
sentences.cn: 她用手掌托着拜伦的脸, 说: “ 是为了埃伦?杰斯特罗叔叔的国籍问题. ”

sentences.en: Ten years later, she chose to take Australian citizenship.
sentences.cn: 十年后, 她选择了澳大利亚国籍.

sentences.en: The reasons for the extension of citizenship are various and complex.
sentences.cn: 罗马共和国时代,公民权扩展的原因主要有四个方面的原因.

sentences.en: Their citizenship in school is very good.
sentences.cn: 他们在学校的表现非常好.

sentences.en: Their German peers had a more developed sense of citizenship.
sentences.cn: 和他们同龄的德国人有着更强烈的公民归属感。

sentences.en: These provisions apply to applications for Australian citizenship by descent and conferral.
sentences.cn: 该条款适用于通过“授予国籍”方式或由血缘申请入籍之人士.

sentences.en: They extended their citizenship cautiously but steadily.
sentences.cn: 他们慎重而稳步地扩大授与公民权的范围.

sentences.en: They're going to take my citizenship away.
sentences.cn: 他们打算取消我的国籍。

sentences.en: This applies only to applications for Australian citizenship by conferral.
sentences.cn: 该条款仅适用于通过“授予国籍”方式申请入籍之人士.

sentences.en: We have tried to inculcate a feeling of citizenship in youngsters.
sentences.cn: 我们试图向年轻人灌输公民意识。

words.tran_cn: [法]公民身份，公民资格；国籍；公民权

phrases.tran_cn: 公民教育；公民资质教育
企业公民；公司公民；公司公民意识（原形是corporate citizen）

trans.tran_cn: 公民权利(或资格，公民归属)
trans.tran_en: the legal right of belonging to a particular country
